title: Unveiling the dye adsorption capability of Moringa oleifera functionalized hybrid porous MOF–GO composites: in vitro and in silico ecotoxicity assessment via antibacterial and molecular docking studies
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,1938-1963
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00185K, Paper

Anil Kumar K., Arpit Bisoi, Yeshwanth M., Shobham, Mohan Jujaru, Jitendra Panwar, Suresh Gupta
Sustainable and eco-friendly MOF–GO functionalized composites demonstrated high adsorption capacity for dye removal from wastewater, offering an environmentally friendly solution.
